Package model.Dao

Class Dao<T>

java.lang.Object
model.Dao.Dao<T>
Type Parameters:
T - type of DAO content
Direct Known Subclasses:
DayPlanningDao, ProductDao, ProductsListDao, ProductTypeDao, RecipeDao, RecipeListDao, RecipesToDayDao, ShoppingListDao, StoreDao, StoreProductsDAO, StoresLocationsDao, UserDao
public abstract class Dao<T> extends Object
Abstract class for all the DAO classes
